cause.description:
Each step brings hope. Every dollar promises care. You can make the difference. Take the next step!To join the fight against AIDS: 1. Register as an individual or start a team online. 2. Set a personal fundraising goal and then encourage friends, family, neighbors and colleagues to support your efforts. 3. Have supporters donate online or by check. Steps for submitting donations: 1. Walker donations online must be received by Oct. 1, 2007, and mail-in donations must be postmarked by Sept. 28, 2007, in order to receive your incentive gifts on the day of the walk.All donations are tax-deductible. For your TEAM to receive credit for walker supporting donations: 1. Put your team name on your 'Support a Walker' Form and in the memo line of each submitted check. 2. Mail-in support: Must be postmarked by Friday, Sept. 28, 2007 in order to be counted toward team totals. Event Location:AIDS Walk Washington will begin and end at Freedom Plaza (Pennsylvania Avenue and 14th Street, NW). The closest Metro stations are Federal Triangle (Blue / Orange lines) and Metro Center (Blue/Orange/Red lines). Event Schedule: AIDS Walk Washington will take place on the morning of Saturday, October 6, 2007. An inspiring pre-Walk program of speakers and music begins at 9 a.m. The timed run will start promptly at 9:30 and the walk at 9:45 a.m. 10/6/2007 Fees: General Registration: $25.00 Student Registration: $15.00
1. AIDS effects everyone
cause.mission: AIDS Walk Washington is a fundraiser benefiting Whitman-Walker Clinic, a non-profit health organization that provides accessible health care to those infected with HIV/AIDS.
cause.name: AIDS Walk Washigton
